title: Kelce's last dance? Why Chiefs star could retire from NFL
summary: With Kansas City's dynasty over and a wedding to Taylor Swift to plan for, the Chiefs' final two games of the season could be Travis Kelce's last in the NFL.

title: This is my toughest time as England captain - Stokes
summary: Ben Stokes said he is going through his "toughest time" as England captain, as the tourists' awful Ashes series is dogged by reports of excessive drinking.

title: 'Why I was always driving home for Christmas'
summary: In his BBC Sport column, ex-Premier League boss Tony Pulis reflects on what the festive period was like as a player and manager.

title: Archer ruled out of Ashes as Bethell replaces Pope
summary: England pace bowler Jofra Archer is ruled out of the remainder of the Ashes series with a side strain, while England drop former vice-captain Ollie Pope for the fourth Test in Melbourne.
